course.subject: CENG
course.name: Polymer Physics and Advanced Applications
course.description: In this course, we alternate the discussion in polymer fundamental properties to the advanced applications of polymers with the artful molecular design. Since polymers are composed of long chain molecules. We will start from understanding the polymer chain nature to the relationship of structure and properties, then to the applications.
course.exclusions: CENG 6000H, CBME 5520, CBME 5550
